lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or that. We also do that, I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the same embarrassment that you feel about us; the way we're feeling about you now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What the fuck was that?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where we play Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god. Welcome. We're already loopy, what could possibly go wrong? So yes, welcome! Before we jump into tonight's game, we have some announcements to get through real fast so hold tight for just a moment. First and foremost, continuing tonight's sponsorship with our friends at D&D Beyond. Our now long-term partner. We're super excited to be working with them for the foreseeable future for the time being with the show. Sam, you have some words, I believe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To plug our good friends at D&D Beyond, I need my fellow castmates to help me. Can we practice? Can you all say, "Boo"?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Boo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you all say, "Yay"?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, the official digital toolset for Critical Role is D&D Beyond.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rules, spells, character sheets, and more, all with a pesky pen and paper?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Boo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! You can access it digitally on your computer, mobile, or tablet.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The cast is using D&D Beyond every week, except for Taliesin.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Boo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just kidding, he is!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to use both the boo and the yay or else it doesn't make sense. He can do cool stuff like activate Critical Role content in his character builder and create a blood hunter.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And do you think they charge an arm and a leg?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Boo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they don't!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: D&D Beyond is offering a discount of $10 off any digital book in their shop. Use code "beginnings" at checkout.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So check them out at dndbeyond.com. Is that D

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Boo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, is that D-N-D Beyond?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And this spot was written by Sam Riegel.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Boo! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, Sam. And thank you, D&D Beyond, for being our partners for this new campaign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Marisha, you yay'ed, good for you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did! It was a little complacent, but I yay'ed. I gave him one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man. Talks Machina, of course, our after talk show about this episode will be on next Tuesday, as it is every Tuesday, after the show at 7:00pm Pacific here on Twitch and Project Alpha, with our host Brian W. Foster. (burp) I always burp when I say his name. I wonder what that says about him. I don't know why.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's that cabbage smell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the cabbage. So check that out. Merch, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, you know, we talked about those posters last week. They're still in the store on pre-order. Some of them are getting shipped out right now, so you should be getting them soon.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to leave them on pre-order until Monday night, so if you're watching this on YouTube after it's been aired live, you've got until midnight to put in that order.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: More will be coming soon if those sell out. You know how it goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once again, we are firmly in support of our longtime charity partners, 826LA. They do awesome work teaching creative writing classes for children who normally wouldn't have the opportunity to get involved. They do phenomenal work. I recommend that you research them and if you can, either help with a donation or actually, you can donate your time as well to help teach and be part of the program if one is near you. Go check it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were talking to one of the heads at 826LA over the break, Joel, and he was saying that they would love to do D&D, but no one on their staff knows how to DM or do D&D. So if there's an 826 in your area, and you're like, "I know, I'll start a D&D club," I'm sure they'll be open to it, just go talk to them and go teach kids D&D!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Run a game for a bunch of cool teenagers and show them how awesome this game is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or cool eight-year-olds who are equally as amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or dorky eight-year-olds or teenagers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those are the same, Sam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nerd is chic now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool! Appearances. Laura and Travis will be at Emerald City Comic Con in Seattle, March 2nd to the 4th. If you're up in that area, go over and say hi to them. I will be at Lexington Comic and Toy Con in Lexington, Kentucky March 9th to the 11th. As well as Otafest in Calgary up in Canada, May 18th to the 20th, and Akon in Texas, June 7th to the 10th.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Calgary is like the Kentucky of Canada.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take that as a compliment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am also going to Bak-Anime, not to be confused with SacAnime, on February 3rd and 4th.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you spell that, B-A-K?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: B-A-K, that's real soon. So I'll be there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beautiful. And I believe--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Comic book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Issue four on the 24th, I believe it is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: By far the most fourth of all of these books. It's easily the most fourth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like the blue hair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, this is new. Just went for this, it's going to slowly darken over time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into pure shadow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be keyframed and photoshopped, I'm aware.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The invitation is there, folks. Screencap and photoshop away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already been told that's it's going to happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back. Last we left off, our slowly gathering band of adventurers had begun to have their stories intertwine in the city of Trostenwald, on the southern reaches of western Wynandir on the continent of Wildemount. Here we had Nott and Caleb who had been traveling southward coming and meeting, in the center of the tavern, the Nestled Nook Inn, with Jester, Beauregard, and Fjord. They were invited to a nearby carnival that had begun preparing for their performance later that evening, in which they met Yasha and Molly. After swapping some stories, earning and losing some gold, they began to gather at the outskirts of the Ustaloch, the lake right on the eastern edge of Trostenwald, for the first opening performance of the Fletching and Moondrop Carnival of Curiosities.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Traveling Carnival of Curiosities.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon entering the tent, they saw a number of performances. However, during a musical performance by this young dwarven girl whose voice was this mysterious, magically enchanting experience, a member of the audience rose up and began to transform into a terrible undead creature that began to lash out, killing another member of the audience, who then began to become one of these same creatures. You all, grabbing your weapons from Yasha, who had been keeping them stashed away, leapt into the fray, slaughtered both of these terrible beasts, just in time for the crownsguard to rush in and ask you what the hell happened. After information had been gathered of who was immediately available and responsible for this carnival, Gustav, Bo the Breaker, and Molly were marked to be arrested. One of the guards was escorted outside of the tent by Yasha, who was going to show him where this young dwarven girl was currently resting, and upon being led astray to the wrong tent, she just ran into the distant hills and vanished. And that is where we left off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're still at the carnival?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still in the tent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With crownsguard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the crownsguard and with Watchmaster Jossyd. The crownsguard that had left naught but a moment before comes rushing in, his breath huffing, sweat dripping from his brow, his eyes wild. He goes, "Watchmaster! The big woman is gone! She's gone!" The Watchmaster turns to him and says, "You three, go with him. Search for her." They all immediately run out back out the performer's flap and he turns to the rest of you in the group, "Shackle and drag those three down "to the stockade." About five guards approach and begin to press Gustav, Bo, and Molly to the ground and begin to put chains and shackles on them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to make a counteroffer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's in mid-speech, "The rest of you keep an eye on the performers here. Ask around, see what "you can find. As for the others, don't go far."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The innocent patrons, you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You will be questioned, and when this investigation is completed, regardless of how long "it may take, you are not to leave Trostenwald."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I could just contribute one word, the 40 or so people who are outside and the rest of us will vouch for this one, the colorful one. He saved many people's lives. Don't take my word for it. There's everyone outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the rest of the crownsguard glance to each other, he goes, "Well, unfortunately, that is "not for me to decide. The Lawmaster would have to be appealed to. If you wish to come with us, we "can bring you along with us to the stockade and you can speak with her. Then, perhaps, she may "grant you leniency, but I can give you no guarantee."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't you just question us right now? I'm confused on why you don't just do that now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we could do that instead. We'll have you arrested, put you in the stockade as we "question the rest of you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, let's go to the stockade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll all be in one place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jails are not my favored terrain. Just want to point that out. Not this go-around. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would have guessed that about you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not really comfortable with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watch over the performers. Make sure nobody "leaves. Come if you wish. Otherwise, we'll be in touch." The Watchmaster gathers alongside the other five crownsguard, lifting up the shackles of the three that had been arrested and begin to drag them outside of the tent and into the night air.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I send Frumpkin to follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I double back into the performance area and see if I can find that little girl that they're looking for? Before they do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may, if you want to. So you send Frumpkin just to follow them. You guys are staying behind, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there three regular crownsguard that are going with Molly? Or is the Watchmaster going with them as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Watchmaster is going with them, or at least he's exiting the tent with them. It looks like there are five crownsguard attending the three of them that are shackled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go out the front exit of the tent just to see if the Watchmaster goes with Molly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll follow Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody with them? Currently, it's you two and Frumpkin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going with them or not? Should we stay here? This is not our affair, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. I'm having second thoughts about being here at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you sent the kitty, didn't you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, and we're not going to leave without him. Why don't we just--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Follow behind a bit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Sounds good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you guys exit, keeping a pace behind, watching the crownsguard guiding the current prisoners towards the actual city, Frumpkin keeping a zig-zagging distance behind and following.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it possible for me, if Nott is holding my hand and leading me, to go full third eye and walk blind and deaf here looking through Frumpkin's senses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say yes, but you are purely like-- because all you're doing is walking forward and you need someone to guide you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he can't communicate to me either so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can talk, but I can't hear you. I can talk and hold her hand so she can stop me from prat-falling all over myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. But you can talk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can talk but he can't hear you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it. Okay. Great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we've done this before so you know to squeeze my hand really hard if I should pipe down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, first off, Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you back out of the performer's exit of the tent into the center of their encampment, the immediate exit, there are already four crownsguard currently searching around and setting up a watch perimeter around the different tents. They're gathering and making sure none of the other performers have fled and a lot of them are being brought out into an area where there's a number of tents all facing towards a large campfire in the center. There's a couple of chairs set up there, it's kind of the common area for the performers of the carnival and it looks like they're all being put out there so they can get a bead on it and make sure they know where everyone else is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try to be aloof, stealth a little bit. I don't want to make myself completely known.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you trying to stealth out of sight or just trying to not draw attention?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, just trying not to draw attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right. Go and make a stealth check just to see if--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, did we just all ditch Marisha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She just walked out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I ditched you. That's cocked. That's better. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Okay. As you kind of dart through the flap of the tent and move behind one of the large carts that currently is still affixed to a horse that is currently just chewing on an apple, and you hear the crunch in its teeth, you glance over past the edge of the immediate near tent and you can see this group gathering there and it appears that no one's immediately aware of your presence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see the little girl whose name was-- what was her name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Toya. You do not see her yet. The guard just got out there and they're just beginning to pull people out. You do see the fire dancer brought out there. You then see the two-- Yeah, Ornna. The Knot sisters are brought out and pushed out there and they're all looking very frustrated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are people being amicable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're not shoving them around, they're just calling them out to the front so they know where they are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I want to look around. Do I see any type of movement in the shadows, anyone looking suspicious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh yeah! Natural 18. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. Okay, as you glance about, you don't see anything lurking in the shadows. What you do notice, though, is one of them bring Toya out of one of the-- the tent that's on the southern side and as he brings her out, there's a heavy thud sound, and you see coming out from behind the tent the large form of-- you heard the name Kylre once, but the ''devil toad." The obese lizard man who's stomping up behind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he a dude or is he a creature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a lizard man, so scaled, humanoid, but extremely thick, bulbous belly, large, almost frog-like legs--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bipedal or on all fours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Due to the size of his form, mostly all fours and lumbering forward on all of them but sits back on a bipedal situation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So they're bringing the both of them out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The toad is hiding behind the tent and as soon as Toya comes out, comes up to the guard and puffs up its chest. The guard spins around and goes for the blade and pulls it out just carefully.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I still next to that horse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The horse is currently still up on the cart, but is about 30 feet from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beast Shape! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take my staff and give a really nice whack to the horse to get it to run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Let's go ahead and make an animal handling check on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We never get to make those!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First of the show!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, I'm so nervous right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're good, you're good, you're good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not great. 11?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 will do. It wasn't a hard DC, but it was more knowing where to hit it to where it would cause it to bolt versus just get angry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get pissed, sure, kick me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So going for-- not to actually hurt the creature but just enough to spook it, you hit it in the right place towards the back of its hindquarters to cause it to suddenly rear up (neighs) (cart clattering noise) and go into a sprint. The cart begins to bounce and smash onto the ground. You can see the wheels clattering into the rocks and the stone between the bits of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to bolt in the opposite direction and try and loop around to the south side of the tent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another stealth check, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big dice, big dice. Okay, 19!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Check!" Points to them and then bolts off to go after the horse. The other three stay, watching over the group.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I loop around, kind of come up behind them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, they're scattered a bit but there's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The devil toad and Toya.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah. Make another stealth check. You're running through open areas each time you're doing this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. (yells) Did you see that?! It leaned to a four. Ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a bastard die right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sucked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a tease.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Laura, put him in the dice jail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have my dice jail out yet. It's okay, he'll chill there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come up around the back of the devil toad, the guard that runs past doesn't immediately notice you because he's focused on where this cart is running off and you can see another guard that was far away from this encampment that's circling back with him. The two of them are now bolting in the direction as the cart begins to slow. It's not just going forward forever but it spooked him and it's starting to slow down. They're just going to inspect it. However, as you slink up behind, the devil toad's head curls back towards you and you hear this deep, guttural (growls).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Okay. It's okay. Toya?" And I look at Toya. "Hey, come on, let's get out of here, let's go."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point a voice says, "Excuse me?!" And you can see the three guards are there staring at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. You didn't say there were fucking guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I did say there were three guards. The three guards watching them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you said they left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One of them left. So wait. Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bad stealth check, I'm sorry. But there's now three crownsguard right there and they're like, "Can I help you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Time to go to jail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is so exciting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill them all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ey! I was actually just looking for the loo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard that's closest to you glances to the other guys and goes, "She was with the group, "right?" They recognize you, and they look at each other. "You're going to the stockade, my dear."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three guards slowly approach and they begin to take out chains and manacle you up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In an effort not to go to jail, you went

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to get the girl. I was trying to free the damn girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're shackled and begin to be dragged toward the stockade.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just the two guards, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the two guards now. As you're being brought back, you can see more guards are coming from the city to the carnival. They're keeping it under surveillance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So are they taking me away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're taking you to the city, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are they doing with Toya? Anything? Are they leaving them behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're leaving them behind currently with the guards that are there. They're not arresting anybody from the carnival, but they're not letting them leave. But they're keeping them there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to do a quick--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill them all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in shackles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to do some monk shit here. I'm going to elbow one of the guards. Right in the ribs. And take the other one and bash the other one in the face and then I'm going to turn to Toya and I'm going to say, "Run! Run! Go! Run!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make all kinds of rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First, go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: This is a terrible idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To not drag any attention towards her, you are completely shoving her into the limelight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trying to distract these fucking assholes. That is a six. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You imagine in your head; you go over it two or three times. As you go through the first step-- (grunt) doesn't go anywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tried to do the Sherlock Holmes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I at least get the "Run!" out to Toya?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she just standing there? Waiting for a guard?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is she doing? Is she running?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Honestly, the devil toad and her seem pretty close. He is grabbing her in a protective manner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, they can both run. Run for your life! Fine, whatever. She wants to get arrested at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two bad rolls in a row. I know. Level two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go join my friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will shortly. Ahead of her, along the way, Gustav is just quiet. Bo the Breaker, Bosun, as you know him by his full name, is grumbling under his breath and is trying to out-loud piece together thoughts on what may have what transpired, saying things like, "I don't know, you "think it's done on the inside? Or is this somebody trying to sabotage it?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think maybe it has nothing to do with us. I think maybe we were just caught in the crossfire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is quite possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry, sir. Trying to keep my mouth shut.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, bring them forward." They go ahead and pull the chains up. The watchmaster bows his head and then leaves the room. She steps forward and goes, "I am Norda. It is my job to keep this city safe and keep shite like what happened tonight "from happening. I approved your second time on the outskirts of our town and you have killed two of "my people. What have you to say about yourselves?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Exactly how did we kill them, exactly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glances over at you. Glances over at Gustav, "I have been told by my guard that you "gave performance, and as part of this performance you released two beasts into the midst of the "population."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Yes, you see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gustav interrupts you and says, "I'm so sorry, my liege. Please, I take full "responsibility for what happened this evening on myself. These people around me had nothing to do "with this. They are not part of the carnival, they were just merely helping. It is my carnival, and "whatever judgement there lies, I take upon myself and my head." At which point Bo the half-orc steps forward, against his chains and goes, "Gustav, what are you doing?" He's like, "Shut. Up. Please, whatever judgement there is, put it upon me," and he bows his head low. "Is that the case? Is he the "only one?" She takes a good, hard look at you and Bo the Breaker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, are you waiting for me to speak? Yes, he's the only one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20. About fucking time, you little shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be talking to you very soon." At which point, the crownsguard drag the chains back and Gustav gives you a quick look under his eye and goes-- as they're pulled out of the room, out of sight. She glances to you, "Well, you're out of chains! That's great. Doesn't mean you're absolved of the investigation. So, where are you staying? You and your compatriots?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, technically we just all met, technically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, technically, as far as I'm concerned, you're all together as part of this investigation."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're a group you guys! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So we're going to have our investigators come to wherever you're staying, which--," and she looks down at some papers here, "-- looks to be the Nestled Nook?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Don't leave the city. We'll be in touch."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, I really like it here so that's good that we get to stay so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you have something to say?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. Just shocked to see someone die in front of me not more than--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can assure you, we're here to cause no trouble. We will be as compliant as we possibly can be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Dismissed!" She claps the edge of the table. The remaining crownsguard, who's left there to keep watch, escorts you out off the stockade, escorts you onto the street.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Her accent is really strong! It's hard to not match her accent! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the one accent that I really have trouble with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you call it infectious?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The one that we know is a problem.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to call my cat back to me and I drop the telepathy and I just start tugging you back to the Nestled Nook. Come on, we have to talk about this. We have to decide what we're going to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excuse me--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not with us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I thought you were right behind us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My cat was in there, but not I.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but you'd have to stay within 100 feet to maintain that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we would've walked up to the building, the cat would've scurried around, if possible. So I'd like to think that I heard all that, which is why just I said all the things I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that. So, you guys are jettisoned into the street. It's now probably just past midnight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mollymauk, I don't mean to pry into your business, but has this ever happened to you before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This has never-- anything like this has ever happened before. And thank you. For the record, I don't owe any of you anything--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I don't know about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: --I swear, but thank you, and I'm ready to help with this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it was the little girl?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just a show!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, the large toad that was with the girl, what's the story there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's nothing special, it's just a guy making a buck, all right? He's fine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the footfalls of guards approach and the rattle of chains as you see Beauregard--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: By the way, where's the obnoxious one? The really loud--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she's just being led towards the stockade.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Help. I'm with you, I'm with you. Help help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought you didn't like jails.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (clears throat) Help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this part of the show by the way? I was just curious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unfortunately, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is the last thing you see as she is yanked into the stockade and out of sight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be very helpful and not go in there with the two of you while you try and get her out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So should we go in and try to get her out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll stand guard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll follow her in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't. Leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have nowhere to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk in behind her. You watch her being pulled to the stairs. She's bypassing the office of the Lawmaster right now and is being brought to incarceration before being questioned. They bring her to the stairs and a torch-lit, subterranean basement area. As you begin to approach and follow behind, you can see one of the guards who is currently on watch. He sees you guys just exit and then walk back in, following another prisoner. And stands up and goes, "I'm sorry, where are you going?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bad luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was also helping to save a lot of people. Big misunderstanding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, see her into her cell and please exit the vicinity."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Appreciate that." He follows behind you guys. They're on high alert and they're a bit scattered. You get the sense right now that they have a lot of their initial stock of guards off-site right now. So they're doing the best they can to hold on to what they currently have in the stockade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the side I say to Jester, I say: This does not really fall in with keeping a low profile. We talked about this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know isn't it so weird?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there is probably a total of ten cells to each side. As you walk through, you can see in the off shadows in the corners a few huddled bodies hunched or asleep. Keeping to the shadows and out of the light. The smell of mildewed wet compost and piss hits your nose like a wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get about five cells in where you can see the guard that was previously in there just finish off closing the cell that contains both Gustav and Bo the Breaker. They move to the cell just beyond that, open that cell, and then go ahead and put Beauregard into that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they not going to take her to see the Lawmaker?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, why doesn't she get to talk to the Lawmaster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he closes and locks it, "Because she decided not to come helpfully."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was an injury from, like, a childhood thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, are you guys making fun of her because of her spasm?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah that's actually-- (fake crying) it was very sensitive for me. I had a really tough childhood. I was just trying to find a bathroom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three guards walk away, not caring. Who were there previously and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spasm shaming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, a man who is on the far end of the hall walks up. And you can see him, he's a man with a heavy, bushy beard that obscures a lot of a dark leather mantle, over a general cloth tunic. He has burly arms, heavy torso, super scrawny legs, a widow's peak, and he looks to be the jailer. He walks up and puts his hand on the bars and goes, "Oh well, if you want to be "patient, I'm sure the Lawmaster will be here sometime in the morning and you can discuss "whatever this business is. But if you want to say goodbye, now's the time."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, we were just upstairs and it would really help us if we could, perhaps, expedite the process. Perhaps there's an arrangement we could come to if she could see the Lawmaster now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm looking injured, man. I show him my eight hit points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many kittens is that again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's sixteen kittens. Kittens have half of a hit point, I don't think kittens have more than that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's eight Frumpkins.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An audience is all we're asking for. No favors.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this is just a wrong time, wrong place thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God bless. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a look and says, "All right, but if she gets angry, it's not on me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understand. Thank you for your understanding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a very calm person. I've never seen her angry, ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives a whistle. Another crownsguard comes up and approaches him and he goes, "I'm "sorry. Could you go and fetch the Lawmaster? They are requesting an audience. If she gets angry, "just add it to this one's sentence." The guard exits and a brief time by, you can hear the slight muddled cursing of a dwarven female descending the stairs. You can see she has an overcoat on, was halfway out of the stockades finishing up her evening in her office.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, remember your little sister.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what? Little sister? What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as the Lawmaster approaches, now pulling the coat over herself, she goes, "Okay, so you've "returned, apparently, needing to poke into what business now before I go off and get some food?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do hate to trouble you again, twice in the same evening. It's incredibly inconvenient.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hate being troubled twice in the same evening."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we may, this sweet girl here was also part of our party and she is quite the protective one. I'm afraid that she was also providing aid to our fellows in that tent. I'm afraid her younger sister was attacked in a similar way. I feel it's only prudent to acknowledge that she was trying to protect this young dwarven girl that performed in the circus. She means no harm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was an adopted sister.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I practically raised her. It's a sensitive subject.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I would like a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah baby. 24. Natural 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Modified by their answers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was helping!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm new at this stat! Don't fuck it up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives a narrow look through her eyes, looks to one of the other guards that you can see standing in the back, a familiar one to you, Beau, and goes, "Is this true?" He goes, "It appeared to "us that she was attempting to escape upon us trying to bring calm to a very tense situation, "but I'll leave it in your realm, Lawmaster." She looks back. "So your sister, apparently, is part "of this scenario as well?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Adopted sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Well, your sister's under investigation."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's staying at the same place that we are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Nestled Nook Inn is where we are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm more than willing to be compliant with the investigation. In fact, you can see the injury the beast left on my ribs, so if you want to test it for any type of specimen samples, feel free. It's very painful, but I'm willing to do it for the cause.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need me to heal that? MARISHA (through gritted teeth): No! For the cause! Do it for the cause!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which she looks to you now and goes, "Are you saying you might have been infected by this "beast?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. It's a separate issue. There was two things going on. There was, like, the big angry toad beast and he got a swipe at me. And then there were people who were getting attacked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Theeds!" And she looks over to the jailer, who goes, "Aye?" And she goes, "Could you have a "look at this wound for me real fast? I want to make sure this isn't something that's going to "spread."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah. Uh-huh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A great idea indeed. And thankfully there was no flesh-to-flesh contact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The jailer, Theeds, takes a quick look at the wound and he goes, "No, it appears to mainly "be just bludgeoning. I mean, we'll keep a close eye on her." You can see now the Lawmaster is rubbing her eyes in frustration and goes, "I just want to sleep."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. It would give us no greater pleasure than to get out of your hair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fine. We'll have guards posted at the outside of the inn. You're not to leave until this "investigation is complete. It may take days. Until we find out who's responsible for these deaths and "bring them to justice, you are not to leave the tavern."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Understood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, at all during the day, even? Just a question. If we wanted to shop or something. Not okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not until this is done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because otherwise, you're welcome to stay here, instead."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is really beautiful here, but I think I'd rather stay at the inn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed we would. This is most gracious of you, Lawmaster Norda.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They escort you guys to the actual inn itself, to the bottom floor of the Nestled Nook Inn, watch you enter, and then post up right outside the main entrance to the tavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should have spasmed a couple times on the way here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Opportunity missed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My little sister? What the what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a dwarf! She's human!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? No, I was trying to say she had a little sister that had a similar incident and that made you try to protect Toya. I was trying to throw you a bone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. You didn't make that clear at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys up in your room, or are you in the tavern?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We're having a talk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're under watch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just trying to go with what you said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You did all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I mean, it kind of worked. But you're not entirely wrong! I was trying to go get the stupid little girl, who seemed to be stupid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you see anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tried to save her. I was like, get the hint, what's going on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would you save her? She turned those people into zombies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stammers)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, she could have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She didn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hi! You're here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, if anything, we should be looking at this guy. Why are we putting our neck out for you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're putting your neck out for Toya for some strange reason and I don't know why, she's perfectly capable of handling herself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you been to this town before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that I can remember. They all look the same after a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've come through once, but that was a while back and you weren't really paying attention.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Busy, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you've never seen conditions like this affect any other carnival goer before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing. Never. It's not us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So great! We're stuck in a city that has zombie issues, that's all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are the other two?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which other two?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The stinky one and the little one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, your friends!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Can we look around and see if we spot Caleb and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You call them Stinky and the little one? All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't appear to be nearby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wonder if they came back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go up and ask the tavern keeper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yorda?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Yorda.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, hi! Everything all right? You had a few bruiser types leading you in here, some of the "crownsguard, huh?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, there was this big trouble at the carnival, did you go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I heard about that. I didn't go in there, but people are coming in here saying--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody turned into a zombie and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I heard that! That's incredible!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! And then we're all under investigation because we saved them! These guards are weird. Hey, did you see the wizard guy, the stinky guy and the little halfling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, they came in not but a few minutes before you did. They went upstairs."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, great! They're here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meanwhile, the two of you are upstairs in your own chambers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: During all of that, I would have dragged you back here, brought you upstairs. And I whip off my ratty coat, throw it on the bed and sit down on the ground so that I'm eye level with you, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, you and I have to make some decisions right now, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I know why we said we were coming here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get some booze, got some books, find a little taste of civilization, maybe some better food.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I didn't say, I also had the idea-- you know, you and I meeting and teaming up has been a good thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes, very good. I know everyone else makes fun of your smell, but I don't smell nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've changed my mind entirely, and I think we should go, but we can't now because we are stuck here for the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Under sort of holding arrest or something? We can't leave the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I was thinking about this. The people we met down there and spent the day with: they are lunatics, but they draw a lot of attention to themselves, leaving us free to sort of slink back into the shadows a little bit. It might be sort of the perfect camouflage. No one's going to be looking for a little goblin girl anymore, because they'll be looking at the crazy people, the tieflings running around smashing shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I had not thought of it quite in that way and that is a good point, but I am not convinced. I'm not convinced. And perhaps we're better off-- maybe I was too ambitious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's give it a day and if things seem a little bit, you know, skinky-doodie tomorrow, we can fritter away in the middle of the day or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Well, we'll wait and see. While we're here, one thing, okay? No Money Pot. No Rat Food. None of those plays. I have silver, we don't need it right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we need to replenish the healing potion you used. If we don't have that, then what happens the next you get in trouble?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're with a couple of tieflings, a little person in a doll mask, and a dirty ginger. We've got people staring at us every second of the day. We need to dial it back a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, but how on earth are we-- all right. We can cool it with the cons for a couple of days. But I can't promise that I won't get the itch again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just talk to me. You hold Frumpkin. Just keep your hands full with Frumpkin, okay? Hold my cat, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then this is going to blow over because we didn't do anything! We did something good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! I didn't do nothing, we just went to a show.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a pretty good show. Up until, you know, the dead people part.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it was a good show, wasn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Well, we'll lay low. Should we pretend that we're still friends with these people?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was going to suggest the same thing. In fact, I think we should go downstairs. They're going to be coming back. We don't want to cause a stir with them, either. We just want to leave if that's what we're going to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry! I'll turn on the charm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank God.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Let's get a drink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank gods.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We head downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys head down. You get to the bottom of the stairs just in time to see Jester, Beauregard, Molly, and Fjord looking across the tavern, making their way in your direction, and you guys notice them meeting you in the tavern room, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, thank God you're here and safe! We missed you! Somehow we got separated! Friends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That happens, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I insight check him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: Her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Her. Sam. Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm lying! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys peaced out pretty quickly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We did, I did not come to Trostenwald to go to jail.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you come to Trostenwald for?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are tired. We've been traveling a long time. We've been saving. Wanted to take it easy for a few days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, I'm not trying to pry. I was just curious where you were going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just curious why you have a mask.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I'm going to listening to somebody's life story I'm going to need a drink. You, gorgeous, what's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over and see a woman with darker hair, the general barmaid. "Adelaine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Adelaine, I would like a round for all these terrible people and one for myself. What's the difference between these three beers? I've honestly got to admit, they all taste the same to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go with the von Brandt."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get a round of von Brandt for everybody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, if it's all the same I'm not really an ale fan. Do you have any fire whiskey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can get you some liquor, aye."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I have some milk?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." She walks away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You think she heard that I wanted milk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I'm going to ask for one of each of these beers because I want to have a tasting competition. I'm not going to be drinking alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wander away from these two with their questions and I sit down with Molly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, you want to see something cool?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would love to see something cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I show Caleb where I etched the dick in the table a couple nights ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Bringing it back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How'd you etch a deck in the table?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a dick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you always been an artist?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have actually, I've been an artist since I was little.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You think that's what they look like?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've seen a lot of dicks. That is what most of them look like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm already in my cups.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So where do you two come from?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Us two?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you two with the horns.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't know where he comes from. You think we all come from the same place? That was really inconsiderate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you are very different it's very clear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's purple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's blue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which is pretty rare.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's every color.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm from Nicodranas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remember when we started the first campaign and all those places came in a split second and all that history. I'm from Shrev`nam Chicago. Oh yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm from the circus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're a traveler then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. Quite a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Since childhood?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Long as I can reasonably remember at the very least. It's been a while. It's nice. I like it. They're good people. Work hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have a lot of scars.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very funny story, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like funny stories.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did some crazy shit with that sword of yours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. These swords-- you buy a drink and we'll see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You polish off that one already?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, that's a lot-- okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we get another round? For the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much I owe you for the first round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are keeping a tally of the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin scrabbles up onto Nott's shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi Frumpy, nice to see you again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mother always told me to never give a story away for free.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wise words.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My mother said don't give away other things for free.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I already like your mother.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My mother always said nothing in life is free.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can tell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: None of this absolves the dodgy goblin who slinked past that first question. Where are you from? What are you traveling from? Why the mask?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only because we seem to find ourselves in quite the predicament.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just a couple of friends, strolling around the countryside looking for adventure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you see many goblins walking around cities here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has nothing to do with that. People who move from place to place frequently tend to have other stories as to why they're doing it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, let me make it clear: goblins are not typically welcome in any cities, that is why the mask.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you're going back to the goblin thing. I'm more curious about the travel thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a string of bad luck. We tend to get in trouble in places for various reasons. Some of which is my fault. Most of which is my fault. I have sticky fingers. I can't help myself sometimes. I'm fascinated by little bobbles and fancy pieces of jewelries and I love trinkets so much! I just have to take them, and have them with me, and put them in my pockets. It's gotten us in a few scrapes a couple times. Caleb, he is fantastic. Very patient with me, understands. But really it's my fault; it's not him. He's a smart man, a brilliant magician! Have you seen? Some of his tricks are phenomenal, really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'd love to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a moving story.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately check my pockets after that to see is Nott has lifted anything. Is everything still there, all my coin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to join you on this one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not great. Not great at all. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? Everything seems to be in order for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait that was a 15! Right? That was the dice I rolled? 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything seems to be in order.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyway, that's the long and short of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you do with the things once you steal them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well the nice ones I keep. I have a little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a collection?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were in one of those prisons before-- Am I sharing too much? I'm sharing too much, aren't I? We were in a prison, they took all of our belongings. I lost all of my collections. I had a lovely rock collection. I had a rare coin collection. I had a stick collection. Yeah, it's all gone now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about shiny things, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love them. I just don't have any right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I think if you have sticky fingers for sticks and rocks, I don't think that will get you in trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean I call them sticks because I don't need them. But I suppose they really needed them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that makes sense.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's only one way to find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, I'm sorry. I think I need clarification. If sticks mean things like valuable canes, what do rocks mean to you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're really nice rocks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't have many of those at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would it be fair to say that the more someone desires something, the more you're interest increases?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh I don't care about the people who have them. I just like pretty things. Toys, anything really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll keep an eye out for things that you would like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Can you help with that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can if you want me to. Or I can point it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it the joy of taking the things or do you just like gifts?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's the collecting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a nervous tick a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you good at it? Do you get caught very often?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, would you like a demonstration?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, Jester, if I may, we are already in a little bit of a pickle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Steal something from me! Do you want me to close my eyes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure! That'll make it really easy. Are they closed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Out of practice here. I'm going to do a shot. Crack my knuckles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just don't take the thing on my waist, because he'll be pissed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He'll be pissed? What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's on your waist?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking at her waist. What's on her waist?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's on your waist?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My symbol to the Traveler.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. All right, I'll go to her left buttcheek pocket and fish around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm in a dress. I don't have a pocket on my buttcheek. But you can try.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What pockets do you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would have pockets on the front of my dress, and maybe a little pouch on my hip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do the hip pocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You close your eyes and feel a tug and a shake--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your passive perception?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to guess ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, yeah, you totally feel--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're doing great!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is not how it usually works! The person is not really expecting it. This is embarrassing, really. I have the one skill and I failed at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, you can keep practicing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here, you know the trick, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I know the trick. Takes a little bit of time, doesn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. (clears throat) I do know one piece of magic. Feast your eyes--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you place a copper piece into this pot and say the magic words-- what's the magic word again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fibulous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fibulous! It will turn into a silver piece.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I say it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to hear you say it, anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (vocalizing, trills) By the ancient order of the school, fibulous!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a silver coin right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh. Wait a minute. Does this mean the silver I won from you was actually copper?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it only works up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great! Thanks for the silver.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, no, we weren't giving you the silver piece just showing you a bit of magic. This pot is actually quite powerful. It can do that once a day, so if you'd like to purchase it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you turn this into a gold piece?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it only works once a day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, tomorrow can you make it gold?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it only does the copper to silver?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The magic is not that strong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it's a mild magic pot. But if you'd like to purchase it from us, we can sell it to you for five gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five gold for one silver a day? That doesn't add up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: By the end of the week you made your money back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At discount for friends, three gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And for that, we'll teach you your own magic word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 40 days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 40 days?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do it once a day forever, you have it for the rest of your life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I have lots of money. I don't need it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But this is free money, that you don't have to work for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, you know, they basically helped us out today. You can do it for one, for them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, one gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One gold. That's a really good deal. Did you hear how much he gave me a deal? Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you give him the gold?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I'll give him the gold. Hold on, let me make sure I have it. Where's my--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the second button.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, currency! Gold. Okay, one down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I notice anything shifty about that, while we were looking at his hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's my magic word?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It can be whatever you want it to be. You have to agree upon it and you have to focus on that word for one full day while you are in possession of the pot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch that copper piece become silver, magically.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about skinky doodie?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could consider it yours if you focused on it all day tomorrow. But you really have to focus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I will. Super a lot of focus. Skinky doodie. Thank you for this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a pleasure doing business with you. Does that answer your question? I've got some for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have questions for me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! How does someone like you -- you're human right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you come by learning Halfling?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The wine making business. And halflings really like wine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone likes wine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some people more than others.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was around it a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What town was that then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's close by here, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a bit aways. It's Kamordah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hmm, haven't heard of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a small farming town, it's no big deal. It's whatever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing shady there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, just a wandering traveler just like the rest of y'all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well I mean I was really impressed with the little trick, I sure would like to see a big trick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Thaumaturgy to open all the windows!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Being about one o'clock in the morning at this time, and the energy in the tavern has come to a quiet crawl, those who are keeping their cups are either snoring or in the process of preparing to go to sleep, you watch as Adelaine, the barmaid is walking around cleaning up tables and suddenly all the windows in the room slam open with a heavy impact and there's a burst of wind that comes through. The two crownsguard that were outside flanking the opening doorway suddenly rush and look in and look about at the lot of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two extra?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both just slowly curl back to their perimeter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're no fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, circus! Woo, circus coming to town!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, I meant a trick from Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to see a trick?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would love one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am well into my second trost at this point. I can show you a trick. Young lady, if you would assist me please. Step up onto the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just don't break anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Adjust your minds. I begin to weave one hand in a slow circle around the other, and a globe of golden light poofs out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I put my hands and feet out in an akimbo pose.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A second little globule of light comes out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel it coming! Hit me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then two more at the same time come out of my hand. Then they amass upon my little companion and form a similar sized little humanoid of light that then coincides with my little friend. She is glowing golden on a table in the middle of the Nestled Nook.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Goblight, ladies and gentlemen. The Goblight!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's some claps in the back rooms. You see one of the drunken gentlemen has come to semi-consciousness and goes, "That's impressive!" (

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did you learn to do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could always do that a little bit, as a kid. I was always good with magic. I had a knack for it. That one's easy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's impressive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw buddy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he can teach you how to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it something that can be taught to others?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you trying to learn magic? Is that a thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm just a little curious about how people use their magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've seen you have a few tricks up your sleeve. You seem like you're not totally magic inept.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's relatively new for me though, so I'm just trying to learn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you reading a lot?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I wonder if maybe I should be?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it could be helpful. Although, I'm a bit of an amateur teacher. I taught Nott the one trick you saw, but other things. We've been working together, I suppose I could try to help you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you had your abilities your whole life, like a kid?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Again, fairly recently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something happen?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry, do you two not know each other super well? You seem like you do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got a good 24-48 hours on the rest of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're not super deep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did you come from then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well I came up from the town of Port Damali.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's where we met!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I met Jester a while back and after I Ieft town, coming up to the northeast, I ran across her. I'd seen her do some of her magic before. That's what I'm trying to learn about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you need anymore displays, you just let me know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I request a display? I think I have a broken rib. It might be getting more purple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, I mean I can ask, but I think I'm tapped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll sleep it off, it's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I can try! I'll put my hand out. I'll try to cast Cure Wounds. I got shit. I got nothing. It's not happening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's past midnight!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no. I've got to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You concentrate for a moment. Make a medicine check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 12!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. You focus on the bruised area, exposed out of her monk robes. You watch as the slight bruising suddenly turns like a sickly green.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a very unhealthy way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? I think this might be worse than just like a bruised rib. Can I poke it? Does it seem infected?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it hurt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to poke it with my finger, though, I'm going to poke at it with a fork.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't poke at me with a fork!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, she's inspecting it. You take a fork off the table and poke.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you don't!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll use the blunt end, don't be such a baby!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as this sickly pus liquid begins to pour out, with a thick viscosity and a lot of it. You all of the sudden feel like you've punctured a balloon that's beginning to erupt and you feel awful. Then you blink a few times and it's just a bruise. You hear this distant (cackling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, motherfucker, he's such a dick!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Who? What? What's going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My bruise is in the shape of a dick?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be really cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would be fun!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going make sure, I'm going to push on it a bit more. I think it's okay, you're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I'll sleep it off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I need some sleep, you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gustav, the person who runs the circus, is he your friend?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's family.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's family?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We take care of each other. He's a good man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what's your play tomorrow?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, they have all my things and they have all my family. I'm going to figure out what is going on. Try and find out what's actually doing this. I assume since it's none of us, it's going to happen again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But how can we because we can't leave this tavern?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were Caleb and I not instructed not to leave the tavern? We received no formal instruction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you weren't part of that formal instruction. The rest of you were told not to leave the tavern until further notice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure if we sleep on it, we'll think of something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord! You and I could leave in the morning the same way we got in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How'd you get in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With magic. I would show you now, but I'm out of spells!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The fork trick wasn't very fun, was it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought she might be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She got clawed, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A bit, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Hey bitches, I'm going to go to bed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where exactly am I going to be sleeping, by the way? I can sleep down here, but it might be nice--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly, if you would like to share my room, you can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent. You don't mind? I'm going to pull the swords off finally and start getting comfortable out of the performance clothes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sleeping on the floor on my bedroll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As she starts to go to sleep, I want to draw in my sketchbook and tell the Traveler all about the cool things I saw for the day. I'm going to draw the red faced guard as I pretended I was a zombie, and I'm going to draw Molly's horns all full of jewels and stuff! I'm going to draw the stack of books.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The monster attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to draw like a zombie, but like as an old man but as he's biting his dentures fall out and he's not no teeth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you, go to your respective rooms and find yourselves falling into a night's rest. As evening comes to a close and the morning brings you to consciousness, you are rested. You are healed up, your spells are restored.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can use the Long Rest feature of D&D Beyond!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You hit a button!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And all my spells back!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a button for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: D&D Beyond's watching going, "Fuck you, Nott!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait no, you're putting temporary hit points on! What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll work on this during the break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Self destruct in 10, nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He just throws the iPad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably 8:00 or 9:00 in the morning at this point in time and the day is yours. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
