lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door opens, and there are two crownsguards there, standing, shields to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh hello, I wasn't expecting you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're here to notify you that the investigation is ongoing. You will not be needed "today. Please remain in your premises. Be back tomorrow."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jury summon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bullshit! Jury duty shit! Goddamn it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are at D&D Jury Duty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven dollars a day? What is this shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask you a question before you leave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, what is your question?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you guys going to be the same people coming back tomorrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Possibly."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is your names?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am Jonas." The other guy pipes up, he's a little younger, he goes, "I am Lucas."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jonas and Lucas, very good names.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys should start a band. Like a boy band or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you guys want to play some games tomorrow, we'll just be here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well! Have a good day." They look at each other like, "What?" and close the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shouldn't have offered the game. What if we want to leave and then they want to take us up on the game thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you enjoyed games.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I love games!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But what if we leave and then they want to

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Onto Fjord's door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sitting playing with the cards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jonas and Lucas. "Hello. The investigation is "ongoing. You'll not be needed for today. We will return tomorrow."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I shut the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any progress?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a pause and then you here the subtle shifting of greaves against the wooden floor as they slowly walk away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go take that game in the other room, why don't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a power move right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys return to the inn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess we do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well. That was terrible. No one found out anything. It was a waste of a day. We're all terrible at this. Goodnight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not true! I still say that some of the best information that you can get can be in the information that you don't find.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is nonsense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying! Sometimes the lack of information can be a process of elimination.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's super broad!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you know what? I'm going to take it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to be fucking silver lining, so I don't feel like a piece of shit for waste a day, and you guys are shitting on that, but it's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You found nothing at the docks, zip, zero?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We spent hours there, no one knew anything about the old man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See? No one knew anything about him. That means, prime candidate, someone's little experiment. Little Frankenstein. I'm telling you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't really understand what she's saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't either. I'm going to run up and down the stairs for a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (quick footsteps)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long have you known this one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who are you talking to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anybody who's watching this happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About 24 hours longer than you have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That explains a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, can you

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Dungeon Master?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other night, when Nott was out carousing a bit while Caleb was asleep. He saw some figures in cloaks dash by. Was there any distinctive anything about these three figures that dashed by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not that you noticed, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it. Okay, I will share that information with the group. I saw some weirdos running around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other night, when he was asleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How late?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two in the morning?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were out that late?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should go out at two o'clock in the morning and see if we can find them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Follow them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys notice that it's weird that no one's actually really talking about this? This is a small town. I come from a small town. Small town people gossip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like there should be some more gossip then there is, that's very true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone is talking about this, we just haven't found them yet. 2:00AM field trip!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can always leave through the window this time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm, I like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can be down for that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I leave the rope tied in here. Can we use your cat? Reel it back up in so that there's no trace of us until we need to get back there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you asking for my cat to haul up our rope?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm telling you that your cat is going to haul up a rope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How is a cat going to lift up a rope?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not that heavy of a rope, it's just hemp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hemp rope can be pretty heavy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if I throw it back up there then I imagine you cat can knock it back down at the very least.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There, that would work, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is he like an asshole cat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assume he's an asshole cat. Aren't all cats asshole cats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might be down before we come back, is the thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assume he's going to-- that's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where were you when you saw these cloaked figures?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had gone out to do some window shopping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At 2:00AM?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I wasn't very successful. I had walked by the general store--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we went there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I passed by a place called Natural Remedies, herbs and medicinal things. I went by a spot named Jackalwere, it's a smithy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but where did you see the cloaked guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was between-- I don't remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was one block north of the Natural Remedies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural Remedies. What was the other one? Jackalwere?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that was what it was called.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Jackalwere Smiths.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could do a little stakeout!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. How do people send messages in this town? Have we figured that out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably by foot or by horse, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that big of a town.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should someone stay up? Well, I was thinking someone should keep a lookout on the roof of the inn in case someone comes for us while everyone else is out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How would we let anybody know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. Can you conjure those golden orbs up into the air as like a signal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pretty limited. They don't go that far.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we just risk it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's risk it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's 2:00AM, I'm sure everybody will be asleep. Let's risk it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we leave-- is there a window in the hall? Or are there only windows in our bedrooms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no window in the hall, only in the rooms.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. On our side of the room--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have three rooms between you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's three rooms and they all have windows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On our side of the door, I'm going to take out my healer's kit. Do I have any bandages or medical tape or anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not medical tape, but there are clean strips of cloth and some adhesive bandages, basic general--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No tape?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to tie a bandage ever so lightly around one side of the handle onto something on to the other side of the door. If there's something like a lamp or some kind of pipe or something I can tie it to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that we'll know if someone tried to come in the room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can pull one bandage out and affix to one of the chair legs nearby. You could do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh for god's sake. I pull out a big thing of string.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yeah. I'll take some string and just some twine and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we going to do? Leave through our window?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To their window?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I figured we're all in the same room at this point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you trying to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to make sure that if someone tries to come in our room we'll know if they come in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can take care of that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, well then, I'm taking my string back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What can you do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have some magic for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, he has a magical spell that alerts you when someone tries to break in your room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is correct. Yeah. I will take a moment to do that and it will let me know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Best part is, it doesn't alert him when I sneak in or out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That you know of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One mile of the warded area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's better! Let's do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just need ten minutes. And I pull out a little spool of silvered thread and stretch it out. Where did you want this? Over the window?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I was going to say in the door, but if there's maybe a place in the hall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I can do the entire room really, I can go doorknob to-- The funny thing about this thread, there's no end to it. So I start looping it all the way around the room and tie it off, and take out one of my books from the holster, the one on the left side, and I open it up. You guys watch as I spend ten minutes referring to the book and tracing symbols on the floor. Along, underneath the thread, and about ten minutes of time, nothing happens, but that's taken care of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See, he's really good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Didn't really look like much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, either that or I'm really bullshitting you and nothing happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Either way, I liked it. Let's sneak out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do one last thing before we leave, which is just tussle the room a bit so it looks like it's been robbed. Just in case they do come in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you toss the room a bit, muddle up the space, and you guys, one by one, climb out the back of the window, down the rope, and into the alley behind the inn. Looking about, you're waiting until about post-midnight, you said?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it's dark. The various lanterns that dangle on the hook poles at different intersections of the street are lit. Other than that, you have a faint bit of moonlight that's coming through the sky. There are some clouds, but they're a bit broken up, so every now and then the moon cover can vanish and then return, but for now you have moonlight in the city. Where are you guys going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Towards the north end.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I ought to be leading the way, I reckon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go to where I saw the three cloaked figures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little ways north of Natural Remedies? Okay. I would like everybody to make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealth check. Do I still have the blessing? No, I don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you don't. But I can do it to everybody, one by one, if we get to an open area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forty-- 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You finally get to the outskirts of Natural Remedies, and to the northern alleyway where you'd originally seen those figures pass. You're there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we fan out a bit? Cover a couple corners, so we can still see each other?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to go with Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's not spread out too far, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you two like an item?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You and Fjord, are you like a thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why, are you interested in him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, ugh, no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You travel together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well yeah, he's a good friend. He watches out for me, I watch out for him, you know. We're a good team. Like you and Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not at all like that, but yes, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys fan out a little bit, everyone make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't see shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Perception?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you somehow get an eyelash caught in your eye and spend the next hour trying to get it out, but it's in the eyelid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, can you see it?

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Let me get it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no. Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About an hour passes. Two hours pass. Around the third hour, you get the sensation that whatever you saw the other night is not arriving on a clockwork time or not arriving at all. It's about three in the morning, in the center of the city by yourself. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three in the morning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: No, I wouldn't have brought it up if something had happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good point.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Just see how this goes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mediation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pouring over the details of what has transpired and what you guys have done so far to find information, there are still things to inquire about. There are still things to wonder and discover and there are a few places you haven't been to. A few places you haven't returned to. A few people you haven't even inquired about closer to the investigation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we should talk to the girl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Toya?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go wake her ass up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she under arrest? We don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we have to go back to the circus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it was Yasha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's early enough maybe we should just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a few more hours and the cover of darkness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's go wake her ass up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scene of the crime? That whole thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate to admit it, but maybe-- it's not us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we don't

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hang back close by though, right? If something goes bad--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or if you see something. How far are we from the inn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the inn? About a 15 minute jog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we can go to the circus?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An hour and a half.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While we're still trying to figure this out, I'm going to take out my painter's kit and draw like a little piece of poop on the side of the building that we're next to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tagging? That's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little tagger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it like a mound of poop or like a single--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No it's like a mound of poop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like an emoji.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a performance check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh I rolled really low on this one. Four!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a little convincing to have them see the poop in the drawing. You can see it, but you've seen better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a worm? It's a snake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's poop, I should've--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's an

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should have drawn a

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It helps, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a triangle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I thought it was like chocolate frozen yogurt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is math or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's dark okay?! I can usually paint much better than this. It's really dark and my hands feel a little numb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's move then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's going where? What are you guys doing?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: We're all going to the circus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stealthily

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I would like for all of you to roll a stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is no one staying behind or--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some are staying

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, going in danger close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh not great. Nine!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, the moon has come out and cast this rimlight against the structure, so it's easy to see. As you guys are making your way outside of the Lochward, you immediately see the approaching torchlight of crownsguard. One of them you just faintly hear 40 or 50 feet ahead of you, "Who goes there?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there only one guard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's two guards, side by side. These watches, they patrol in pairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we in like an alleyway, or in the street?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are keeping off to the side. You're all on the outskirts of the lake and almost made your way out of the city towards where the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go in the lake. Quick, go into the lake!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I cast Disguise Self, and I turn myself into a crownsguard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disguise Self and follow suit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've all of a sudden are adorned in the goldish brass and red armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in my black hood. I've got my hood up now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anywhere to hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are some small alcoves, but you guys are out in the open, now. They've seen you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. They've seen

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk into the lake and crouch down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester walks up and wades in about six inches of water and just-- gives her best duck impression.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will take off my mask and start attacking Caleb in a convincing fashion. Not to draw blood but-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Deception check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I start going (groans) Oh get off, you little beast! To help with the illusion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (snarling noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, my deception check was a three minus three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But roll with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At advantage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm helping you, you little--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven minus three!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay so as soon as these two crownsguard see this, they go "Shit!" They pull their blades and they start charging you, Nott, to try and protect their other crownsguard--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take Nott and slam her into a wall as hard as I can and say: Down you beast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you rush up in a jog, blades drawn, one of them is going to go ahead and attempt to strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god! Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 14 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Miss!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you manage to (squeaks) and narrowly dodge the blade as it strikes through the back of your cloak and pins it to the side of a wooden pole that is on the outside of an overhang where some of the fish are being left out to dry and turn into fish jerky. It holds you in place as you're snarling and looking scared. The other one pulls out his blade and says "Where did this thing "come from!?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have it! And I punch Nott right in the face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take one point of bludgeoning damage, Nott, and blood just (flowing noise) from the nose.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have this. We're taking these people across to jail.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (Regal voice) Indeed, stay our blade, please, obviously he can handle this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't you fucking move you little green piece of filth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (spits)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right in your face! Haha, incredible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one is mine, thank you. Beat her within an inch of her life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a deception check on that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are just the worst. This is just terrible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've practiced this before. We got this routine down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a look of disappointment come across the two crownsguards' faces in their inability to help you skewer this small, feral creature. They both put their blades away. "All right if you see "anything else, give a shout. (spits)"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both continue their walk past the rest of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The rest of you lot fall in line. I drag the little one off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (snivels)

lines.text: They look over at the tiefling-- partially crouched in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's taking a shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really had to pee!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey! Not in the Ustaloch!" (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh okay. I get out. I stand up and slowly dredge out of the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your legs are soaked from thigh to foot, and they both eye you warily and slowly walk past.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sigh of relief)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's real cold out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have they cleared the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, they pass beyond a point where you feel absolute dread of their presence.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you all right? I am so very sorry, I'm so sorry--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm fine that was good acting. You were perfect. I panicked, I didn't know what to do. I was trying to create some sort of distraction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me see your teeth. Okay. You look all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I can't tell if that got worse or better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You fixed them a bit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Who wants to go to the circus?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys are make the rest of the path to the outskirts of the circus. You see at the very front flap of it you see a crownsguard who's like (yawn) sitting there, his arms crossed to the front keeping an eye out, he is doing late-shift. You do see the faint distant flickering glow of firelight from the back side of the circus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is that? Do you guys have like a nightlight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's where we camp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you saw it earlier, you saw the campfire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want to make your ways around, I could distract them for a moment, have a conversation with them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they still look like crownsguard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For an hour.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You you want to go with them? I'll go with him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but will you be watching me or no? You don't have to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin will go with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll go with you and-- who else is going? Are you stealthy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll take care of you. Don't worry!

lines.text: They're not going to talk to you without

lines.text: Sure I got it, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: I'm going with the girls, because the circus kids won't talk to them without me.

lines.text: All right, so the three of you are going forward. What are you doing? I guess I should ask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk up to the guard. (regal voice) It's a late night, not much action this evening. See anything unusual?

lines.text: "I need to sleep. Regular hours."

lines.text: Yeah, have you heard heard? How long are they supposed to be here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Until they finish this fucking investigation. They keep bugging people for "information, but they're all just clammed up and not saying shit."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's bullshit. I wish they would just go ahead and execute them. That carnival master or whatever and get it over with."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did they find anything inside, today? Tell me,
