lines.text: "They investigated the corpses and found nothing yet. Still in there if you want to take a look at it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you mind if we popped in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean I suppose so." Make a deception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something good, something good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He thinks a second on it. "Oh I suppose so. Go on in."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be quick, super fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If there's any way to expedite this, if you can "pin it on any of them, we can just kill them and take care of it. Let me know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Grog) That worked way better than I thought. Like we should-- I mean-- (as Fjord) should we look around for stuff or what? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are very good with voices.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well you know, I do a little mimicry here and there. We should look, come on. Check the grounds. Maybe we can find where the bodies are laying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's have a look around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no light inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take a rag out of my side satchel and I cast-- what the hell is it called because I've only been a wizard for a short time-- one Dancing Light underneath the rags so it's only dim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you have this self-made hooded lantern with the hood you have over it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's dope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck are we looking for in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Nott, you're going with them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm with the girls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where did the bodies fall? Over there, didn't they?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well let's search the grounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way inside, the smell is pretty bad. You can smell the flesh beginning to decay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have they moved the bodies or are the bodies still there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a bit of looking, the bodies are still there where they left them. They have not moved, you can see a couple of remnants of notes and sheets that have been crumpled, but the bodies have been left where they are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we check the bodies for anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything arcane? From all my studies, does anything here ring any bell? I have a photographic memory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go and make a religion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. That is a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you don't have a lot of research on the undead, or whatever might be the essence of this creature's creation, and the more you look at it, you're like, "This is not my specialty."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. What about the perimeters of here, where all the people were? There was a swarm of people. I spend five minutes seeing anything was dropped of interest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check, both of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I miss the twins.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about, you can see the track marks of everyone fleeing. You can see the spatters of blood. You can see the place where the transformation occurred. There is a horrible shedding of certain layers of flesh. You can see previously existing layers of flesh and muscle that were shed as whatever this undead thing was fell to the ground. Once again, you make a religion check as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Roll high. I did not. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. This is not your specialty. You have little experience with the undead and this type of magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't spend that long in here. Maybe we just take a bit of it with us. Do you have a pocket?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have many pockets, of course I have pockets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a jar? I-I got no pockets!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You designed a character with no pockets?! Why would you do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no pockets! All right, but I'll check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's just in the Blue Man Group unitard and that's it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure Rob Liefeld just got a nosebleed and he doesn't know why.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So this dead thing is here in front of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of them. There's the main one, the ground zero one, which is where you were putting all your attention, and then there's the woman, who was transformed as part of the first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will take my dagger, and I will slice a little bit off of the woman, and it's going to get dark in here and I will snuff out the light and use the rag to roll it up and I'll put the little piece in my pack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a squishy sound you place it within your pack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get out of here, I'm going to be sick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The four of you, I need you to roll stealth checks, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh not bad! 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without issue, you guys quickly dart around the side of the tent and make your way right towards the central area where the multitude of tents to this back encampment is placed. There is a single campfire. The embers are burning out. It has not been kept up. You do see two crownsguard who are currently keeping watch. One of them is slumped in a chair across from the fire and is nodding off. The other is doing a basic patrol and looking around. Other than that, you don't hear any sounds, you don't see anybody else. Just the two crownsguard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which of the tents is currently occupied?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then there's a medium sized tent on the north side. Who would be in that one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Toya and Kylre share a tent, that's right. It would be Desmond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Desmond would be the other one. It would be Gustav staying there as well, but Gustav changes between the tent and the cart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The cart?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a wagon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Molly, I have a question. What made you guys set up your tent here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were told to set it up here, if I recall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In this specific area?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds right. If I recall, we were specifically told to set up tent right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it's by the lake, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe 150-200 feet away from it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty close to a lake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if they set up their tent on a cursed land or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the lake, it's common?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the easiest tent to get to without--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to go to the north side or the south side of the main tent?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to go with whatever's furthest away from the guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shouldn't we just go to the Toya tent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Toya tent's on the south side, that's the opposite side, you guys would have probably come in from the north end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the easiest to get to without--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be the one that contains Ornna and the Knot sisters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go back there and do our traditional (bird call)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There's actually no response.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (bird call)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had Mona and Lena, but maybe it's Lolie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yuli. It's Mona and Yuli. I'm going to try one of the other tents. Am I getting the sense that any of them are in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look over here!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Over here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other tent you get to and you make the same sound? This would be the one that Desmond usually is in, too. There's a pause, and then you hear a very faint (bird call).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You glance inside and you can see, leaning up from a bedroll, Desmond who is half-awake, and glances over and sees you. He's out of outfit, out of makeup, and he gives a nod.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) Do you know what's going on? (switches to normal volume) Assume we're whispering, because this is bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How is it? What's happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They've come around asking a few questions, we're trying to figure it out ourselves. Are you "okay?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could be worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How's Gustav? And Bosun?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They couldn't be worse. And then Yasha Yasha'd. I don't know. Did Toya see anything? Did she say anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're still trying to figure this out ourselves. Are you alone?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're idiots, but they're helping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well bring them in."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We come in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even though you're all under the cover of night and having this conspiratorial conversation, he has this melancholy about him that permeates the space inside the tent. He says, "So you're all the ones that helped earlier. Thank you. It would have "been far worse if you hadn't."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do they think happened? What are they asking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're thinking Gustav made this happen. I don't think it's Gustav, he's a good man. He makes poor choices and it's plagued him his whole life, you can see it in his brow. But good intentions have grave consequences. No one that good comes out of Shady Creek Run without some mistakes behind them, but I don't see him doing this."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What would be the point?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has it ever happened like this before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything weird ever happened before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bunch of strange freaks gathered to this show."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was there anyone new here recently that you haven't worked with a lot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, she apparently ran off."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yasha's the newest, but she can be flighty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about Mona and Yuli?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The sisters are bitter, but it's no fault of theirs."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are they bitter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because the world is cruel."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've never met it-- Well, nevermind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wish I could help them, but it--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stutters) What happened to them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you drunk? What's going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm trying to hear and whisper at the same time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can talk at a normal volume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magical whisper. Cone of Whisper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Matt Cone of Whisper!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh God, that's a new thing now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did they say? Why do they think that? Why is the world shitty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you been around? Have you travelled to see anything?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Listen. The world has its own brand of shitty depending on whose eyes are looking at it, right? So what is their brand of shitty?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Circus shitty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. Ask them."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In a tent over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They don't seem to take much of a liking to me anyway, so I can't really tell you myself. I'm "sorry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't like you? Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a lot of people that don't like me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like you, Desmond. I think you're great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why? What did you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks at you and goes, "Same reason folks probably don't like you; you're different."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is everybody still here? They've not taken anyone away other than--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Other than those two, everyone else is here. We're just keeping under watch until their "investigation is complete."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Molly, why did you laugh when I asked about the sisters?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're carnival people, we've all got our issues. You don't end up here if you're not a little weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try something? I want to try to cast Detect Good and Evil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cleric shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the area. It lasts up to ten minutes, so it's within 30 feet of me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You ever cast this before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: First cast!

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: First blood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you cast it. You concentrate. You reach down and grasp the bottom of your symbol that hangs around your belt, and there's a faint rush of divine force given to your consciousness. You don't sense within 30 feet of you any fiendish, or celestial, or fey, or undead, or aberration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing that's been desecrated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing from this tent or within 30 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it follow her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it follows me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like a radial thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we'll see something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Am I close to the edge of the main tent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two tents to the north. There's a bigger one, and a medium one. The one that you're in right now is the larger one to the north, and as such contains-- Actually no. The one that you guys are in right now is the medium one. The one that contains Desmond. The larger one contains both of the sisters and Ornna.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And they're closer to the big tent? Where is the big tent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. The big tent is about ten to 15 feet from the one you're in right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool. Yeah, let's leave. I'll get up to the edge of the big tent, and I want to see if I can feel anything weird in that area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is everyone else staying inside or are you going with her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going with, but before we leave I'll ask Desmond: From one outcast to another, are there any questions that are bugging

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He thinks for a second. "I don't want this all to fall on Gustav. He's done a lot of good for" "all of us, and the way they're talking about the investigation, they're looking to make a scapegoat" "of this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (mimics bird call poorly) That's how they talk to each other. That's how carnival folk talk to each other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, for fuck's sake. I'm going to do my best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to quietly sneak out the back of the tent again and sneak into the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another stealth check, my friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, I hate all of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to give Molly Blessing, so you get advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 13. Not great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys make your way up to the edge of the tent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to make the noise I'm just going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. As you make your way over to the edge of the tent where the sisters and Ornna are, you focus and concentrate. Nothing, from the radial thing. One of the guards, who's standing up and making a patrol, looks over right as you duck behind and you hear a "Huh?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quick, go in the tent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to go in the tent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all duck under the tent go and act like we're sleeping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all dodge under the tent just as the guard begins to pass around. You hear the footsteps around. As you step in you watch as the two Knot sisters--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shushes)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both curl into a ball and stay really quiet. All of the sudden Ornna comes to consciousness and (light footsteps) the footsteps finish the circle and then go back towards where the fire is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ornna leans in, goes like, "Okay, what is going on."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what I'm trying to figure out, what the fuck is going on. They're with me, it's been complicated. Gustav's in deep. Bosun's in deep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell us you know something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you want to know?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did you see? I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who did this? What was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I looked and I saw what you saw."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is Ornna I assume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Ornna, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ornna is the fire dancer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For fuck's sake, they're going to kill every last fucking one of us unless we figure this out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's like, "Right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well the sister's over here think it's a hit job, but this isn't a hit job with zombies? "Are you fucking kidding me?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I think that they're trying to cover something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's not surprising."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I insight check the sisters? What are they doing right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both just quietly curled up and watching you guys talk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're not saying anything, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet. If you want to ask them something you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they look nervous or are they just being shifty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check to find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While she's doing that I'm going to try and sneak out the underside of the tent to go to the big tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a bit of a leap. This goes about 25, 30 feet south of where you are around the campfire that's open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your stealth checks, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god. I miss Pass Without a Trace so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a number.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What was your insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, as you curl around the outside, there's the one guard that's sitting in the chair by the fire that goes like (snores) and opens his eyes a little bit and looks over in your direction, Jester, and there's a brief moment where he's just looking right at you. Do you do anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I freeze.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stands up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use-- oh shit. I'm going shitballs, shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just tucking around, getting ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're around, you don't see anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't see this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, he doesn't see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Charm Person on the guard that sees me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As he stands up, he goes toward you and he goes for his blade and he has to make a saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which he does not make. I don't think so, it's like a six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's like 13 or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he goes like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi, I'm not here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Sit down. Go to sleep, this is a dream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so close. This is so bad. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't seem to buy the dream thing, but he's like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want it to be a dream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't go to sleep but he knows you're there and he's keeping an eye, but he's not doing anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well it's good enough, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But he's definitely aware that you're there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go towards the big tent just so I can see if I can sense any evil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Really quickly, just to check because it's-- That's right, Charm Person is not--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's at this point that you turn your attention to the tent and focus. There is a hefty, radiating warm fiendish source from the inside of that large tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We found something!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can sense something. Let's go in the tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go in? But if it's bad, that's bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it's just a dead thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, will we have to fight a dead thing? Should we get some help? I turn to Caleb's cat and I say go! Go get Caleb! Shoo! (hiss) Go away! (hiss) I can't speak Cat! Go away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cat goes, (angry meow).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go away! Go tell Caleb we're here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (hiss)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns around and sprays you and then keep walking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I've sent for help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Let's go under the tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you curl into the interior of the tent you hear a very heavy (snoring).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This the big tent that you guys were just in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's the one on the south side of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a different one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Toad guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the slowly expanding and contracting form of Kylre from the back side. You see this giant, scaly, somewhat oily exterior of the body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's why you detected him, because he's a fiend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he's a good fiend, can fiends be good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, you detected--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he still sleeping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snoring)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's still sleeping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can wake him up and ask?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And ask if he's good or bad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Eh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anyone else in the tent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, we suck at this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This? Everything!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's better. You just stare right at the body of this toad going, "Nope."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This looks really big and scary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance and see a faint bit of a whitish material from the crook of the arm. You take a few steps forward and glance from the side and you can see asleep, cradled in his large, lizardman arms, Toya, dwarf girl is curled up and asleep peacefully.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should talk to her, but if we wake her up he's going to be mad. I guess we have no choice, we should talk to her. She's a dwarf? Do you speak Dwarvish?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe she speaks Common. We'll be fine. She's a circus person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have that ability, it lets you know exactly where the fiend is. Which of those things is the fiend?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which of the things is the fiend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the large source.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's definitely the large fiend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could have easily been the little girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could have been, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the big guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's wake her up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The radiance is around the large creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And her name is Toya?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Toya. Singing dwarf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's sit down on the ground and look non-threatening. So we sit down cross-legged. Just casual. Like we're having a tea party.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put down my hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we go: Toya! Toya wake up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wakey wakey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The breathing stops and there's this stillness in the interior of the tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should light a light or something? Otherwise we're just in the dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What. you. want?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're here to talk to Toya.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point the little girl (yawn) begins (grunt) (thumping) and rotates in his space. He takes up almost the entirety of this tent. And slowly rotates around inside. Surprisingly quiet for his size. And still clutching Toya, Toya sits up and is like "What's happening? (yawn)"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry to disturb your slumber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes her braids and holds them with her hands, it's almost a safety blanket she curls into herself. She looks about 11 or 12. This close you can see she looks younger than she did from that distance. Whether it be the presence or the mature voice. But she seems pretty young. But she's not childlike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh hey! What's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: " Well?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you recognize us from the other night? Last night?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Last night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Last night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't remember, I got scared."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was scary. You have a really pretty voice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you notice how when you sang that a dude turned into a zombie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She begins to chuckle. And the big toad (laughter). "I did. It was really scary! I didn't "like it at all. I didn't do that, did I?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has it happened before, or was that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. The guards are saying I probably did that, they're saying I might have done that." It's interesting, you notice now listening to her, she has this beautiful voice but her speaking voice is very crackly. It sounds almost damaged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you sing all the time, Toya?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I sing a lot. It's what keeps me alive, it's what gets me money."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. I understand that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was that the same song you always sing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. It's the one song I know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did it feel the same coming out of you or was it different?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It felt the same."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What language is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's an old dwarven tune. My mother taught it to me before she passed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a tale of the angels and how they came from the realms beyond of the gods. They granted "each to us our sparks of life."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Granted sparks of life. Does that sound like a familiar story that I've heard before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sounds vaguely religious, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you were singing, did you hear any other sounds or words that someone else was saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, not beyond the ordinary. Then I saw that poor man just start tearing through people. I "got scared and Kylre helped me." She puts her arm up and pats and (grunt).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you and Kylre meet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They brought me into the circus. I was up in a city north of here, far north of the Marrow "Valley and I was just on the streets singing. And this carnival came by and I met Gustav and he "invited me to join and that's how I met Kylre and I met all these wonderful people."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has anyone new come around and talked to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Asked you to do anything? It's so strange.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, we suck at this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The newest people we've had are Mollymauk and Yasha."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're new?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Comparatively. Mollymauk's been here almost two years now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He came after I did. We both found our voice together. I was very scared and he wasn't "talking and together we helped each other learn to have fun again."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And yesterday before the show you didn't notice anything weird, anyone creeping around the carnival, setting up anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Snooping around?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody in weird cloaks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cloaks, cloaks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't see anything."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, on a minor note, I put my hand on Fjord's shoulder and say I'm going to be blind for a second, give me a little slap if anything goes wrong. And I tune into Frumpkin who should still be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time you notice (laughter) Nott going "Shoo! Cah! Go find help!" and you hear a (hiss) (grumpy meow). Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then Frumpkin takes off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin starts heading back around towards you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm looking at myself after a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Briefly, as you keep concentrating, Frumpkin finds his way under the tent and comes up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anyone you think would want to destroy the carnival or hurt Gustav? Does Gustav have any enemies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope not. I know him and Ornna argue a lot, but--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hot lead!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go! We've got it, we've solved the case!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to have a tiny bit of conversation with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So while they're gone, the two of you are in the other tent with the sisters and Ornna.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would like to talk with the sisters while that is going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both sitting there, knees tucked to their chest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go and sit down next to them, putting my knees up, too. This whole thing is really messed up, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, you're telling us."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Man. Like, why would we do anything like that? I feel like we're all being needlessly persecuted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, who are you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry. I'm Beau. The other Bo, but I helped fight the zombies the other night. I'm under house arrest. We're under the same situation, just separately. Not really. I don't want to compare myself to you, because that would be rude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two halfling twins look at each other, and back at you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Her name's Beau. She's helping, she's awful, you have a lot in common.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, well, I mean, whatever you want to know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's such a dick. Why is he such a dick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Molly's great, why are you such a dick?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reversal!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry, he's been talking shit about you this whole time, I don't know, I just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stirring the pot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk by the two twins, because I'm circling the tent, trying to get a look, and be like, I've absolutely been talking shit. You're both terrible. I give them both a kiss on the head and keep walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They both, "All right, so what are you trying to do?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What am I trying to do? I'm trying to figure out who's behind all this so that we can keep moving on with our lives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, well, get it over with. Soon as this is done, we're out."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They may not let us leave. They may be killing us all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're not going to kill us all!" The other goes, "They're not going to kill us all."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're weird out there. They're very weird out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your guys' performance was amazing, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I loved it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're stealthing over to that tent, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we were stealthing over to the main tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one with Ornna in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ornna's in the tent with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you guys are going to the main tent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to get to the main tent to see if I could sense any evil in the big, main tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you want to swoop by the main tent?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if it's really far away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not too far away from where you were, because you're backing out the side of it. So you can go ahead and stealth around. Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god. Please no one, please no whammies.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Big money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, and what did you get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you, without issue, make your way around towards the large tent without being seen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any evil?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sensing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No fucking evil!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Ornna! We know who it is! We know who the killer is!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While you're talking to the twins, I'll be talking to Ornna. Oh, for fuck's sake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be honest, if it's any easier, it's probably Gustav."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not fucking Gustav.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It probably is, you shut up. He's a prick, he doesn't know what he's doing, he's going to run this whole carnival into the ground. I don't want to take the fall for it, we all get away on this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Little feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (snarling noises)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eats and shoots the same way. (snarls)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, it's probably Gustav? What makes you say that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because he's in prison, he's the leader, he's fucked this whole thing by letting this happen."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Wow. You have interesting perspectives. Hey, weird question, how do you guys come up with your acts? Is that something that you guys create yourselves, or do you guys workshop it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like she's never experienced boredom. It's very weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. It's impressive."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, Ornna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ornna goes, "Yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) I mean, I know your feelings on all this. What do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "I'd say Bosun's a stand up guy, if a bit of a self-absorbed dick at times. And we all "knew Gustav was going to shit the bed sooner or later, I mean, this is his karma. I just don't "know how, or why, but I can guarantee you, if this was my carnival, this shit wouldn't have happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mm-hmm."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What exactly would you have done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, first off, I would have made sure that we had better support from the guard before this all happened so nobody else got killed."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They were useless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Secondly, I would have made sure that there weren't any old folks that made it in to fucking turn into shit."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's on me and-- That's on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You feel the same way, Knot sisters? Feel like this is karma on Gustav?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They would.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the flap of the tent opens up and it's Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Ornna!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ornna, you have a lot of explaining to do!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have a lot of explaining to do!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've talked to Toya. She knows it's you who did this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We know you guys are in a fight all the time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're the one behind the whole plot! You did it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two Knot sisters immediately go, "Ornna? Is it you? Did you kill that guy?" Ornna's like, "I don't know what you're talking about. What the fuck is this? Who the fuck are you!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did you turn that guy into a zombie?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who do you work for!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ornna, Ornna.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Insight check on the Knot sisters!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They've got Nazi in their name!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Knot

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20! [all exclaiming]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whispers!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The first whisper!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give me that sweet whisper!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, I don't know about you. But my stats are so neat because of D&D Beyond tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no pencil smudges.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I know right now I've got 14 of 15 hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It opens, it closes, you can see your spells when you need to see them without flipping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a little iPad button on the back of my pen, it's quite nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Start talking, or this gnome-- nope! Goblin! Starts biting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the circus is probably not going to be the same after this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Insight check on the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insight check on Ornna.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My cat is on patrol because we've been standing with our dicks in our hands for a long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! I'm not complaining, but I would have sent the cat out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of hard to read. She seems genuinely frustrated and caught off guard by this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think she's telling the truth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ornna, you might as well come clean, this is classic you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks at you. "Molly."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just trying to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fuck you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, fuck you, too. It's no secret that Ornna and Gustav have their differences, but this ridiculous. I mean, she knows damn well that half the circus would leave if he got fucking arrested and died.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're for real worried about this? You really think who it could be? Let's play. Gustav: he's an idiot. But he's not a murderer. Bosun: bit of a dick. But he's a stand up fella. Toya: absolute doll. Couldn't hurt a fly. Mona and Yuli: They're cunts. But they're not going to kill anyone. Desmond's a weird fellow. There's something dark in his past; you can see it in his melancholy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But this is not his style.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Desmond. Let's go to his tent!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just grab--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's some untrustworthy intelligence in those lizard eyes of that devil."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did get a very evil kind of vibe off him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you mean evil kind of vibe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, he's a fiend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The devil toad guy. He's a fiend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's just a name. It's not actually, like real thing. That just-- [stammering]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys know he's a fiend, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this moment of silence, like, "He's supposed to be lizardfolk."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the lizard man!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I grab and push you down into the ground and hold you. (shushing sounds) Not yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're cracking this case wide open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, what are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, just because we're standing here so long, I would have been nervous and again held on to this guy's big bicep and sent the cat out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you going all catatonic on me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Nice. As the cat darts under the tent and makes its way through, you glance over to the fire and sees a large dark shape step out from one of the tents and you watch as one of the guards who's sitting in the chair stands up and crumples onto the ground without a sound. You see the other guard look over, go over and run up to him and start to check on him. You guys hear a voice in the back start saying, "Damon? Damon?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a guard. One of the guards.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, something bad is happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the dark figure spins and two flashes of red in the shadow nearby and you watch as the other guard suddenly grabs his head and grasps at his chest and falls on his back as his legs curl up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I know where in relation to Fjord and I this is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is to the east of you, about 150 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you talk to me when you're looking through the cat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can talk, but I can't hear anything when I'm doing this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You watch as the shadow bounds like a giant frog--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The frog is on the move. Frog is on the move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --northward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Away from us? But I don't know where the others are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hear the name calling, and then silence once more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Can we peek outside of the tent and see what's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys go ahead and you look just as the guard on the ground is like (gurgling) and just stops moving. You see all the veins bulging.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run up to the guard and check his pulse. Is he still alive or is he paralyzed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come out of the tent, you watch as the flesh on his neck and throat splits and a very familiar transformation begins to take place as both of the guards begin to (growling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. We have to fight them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but get under the tent! We can get the drop!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I come out of it and I-- Zombies. I start running towards the tent that I saw Jester peek out from under.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something you had noticed a little bit in the body of the old man before, but you didn't know if it was decomposition or just general dirt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you help us handle this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the two halflings are like, "Fuck no!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: [laughing]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two mutated guards now, their armor bulging and broken in places, turn to the noises in the tent where you guys are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we in the same tent or are we in two different tents?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bastard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it is 11 now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we're not supposed to be there! We're gonna get framed for it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly, we can't get framed!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I just say, Laura and I busted the case

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is true!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We solved the case. Easy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Totally.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which one's Nancy, which one's Drew?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Couple inquisitions. Couple little, uh-- Following the clues.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just one more question.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When that demon frog leapt, how high and how far, approximately, did it look like it went?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it leapt about 20 to 25 feet in the air and traveled about 40 feet with the leap. It was a large arc.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we definitely can't fight that thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure we can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw it escape northward from where you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And did it look like the same figure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards the Ustaloch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Towards Ustaloch! It's the fucking lake! [crosstalk]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man, this is good, dude!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See, here's my thing. Does anyone else notice that the zombie transformations seem like a serpent shedding its skin? Because they always slough off their skin?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's also done without any contact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's done without any contact. He never touches him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he touched him, didn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought he did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they just suddenly began to erupt in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, bonus news, though. The charm spell guy isn't going to turn me dead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at that silver lining!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This season got dark. Season got dark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa. Tight tight tight tight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good shit. Little damaged voice, fuck yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to cough for her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [no audio] ♫
